data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The evening certainly has a different appeal to me as far as its occasional silence, the gentle breeze, the moonlight, the bright and beautiful stars in the sky are concerned. The evening allows me to spend some quality time with my family and friends while watching some good TV programs and movies. I also like to get out and take a little walk in the street after dinner. Sometimes, I read books before going to bed. Anyway, the evening is different for me from the other parts of the day because it provides me with clarity of mind and I enjoy it very much. (103字)
data.referenceText: Describe your favorite part of the day. Is it morning, afternoon, or evening? Why?
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一天中你最喜欢的部分。是早上、下午还是晚上?为什么?
